net.sf.jclec.algorithm

Class PopulationAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm
      • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.PopulationAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IAlgorithm, IConfigure, IPopulation, ISystem, JCLEC, IRandGenFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CHC, G3, MGG, NSGA2, SG, SPEA2, SS

    public abstract class PopulationAlgorithm
extends AbstractAlgorithm
implements IPopulation
    Algorithm that operates over a population.
    Author:
    Sebastian Ventura
